document.full_text: south korean officials downplayed the threat, saying the military hotline, located in the eastern part of the korean peninsula, is used only about once a week ' mostly to make sure it is still working.
document.title: north korea threatens to close hotline with south
lines_and_colors: south korean officials downplayed the threat, saying the military hotline, located in the eastern part of the korean peninsula, is used only about once a week ' mostly to make sure it is still working.
